page.title: 03Village School.
page.content: Stepaside School was opened on the 2nd July, l877. This is recorded in the school log books located at the Pembrokeshire Records Office, Haverfordwest. O.S. Skidmore was headmaster for the first 34 years until l9ll. He was followed by Brenig Jones until June, l923. The number of pupils recorded during his time reached l53. J.W. Phillips was head until l937, he was followed by Clifford Jenkins. In l979 Mr. D. V. Griffiths became head. Mr. R. J. Griffiths, B.A. is the present headmaster. Mrs. K. Owen at present away on maternity leave is the deputy headmistress. Miss Payne takes the infants and Mrs. Freeman the juniors. There are l0l pupils on role but only 4 classrooms. There is no hall and the toilets are across the yard. The Authority are planning a new school.
